alert.note: Alert for Chattooga; Dade; Walker (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 12:26PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Walker, southwestern Dade and northwestern Chattooga Counties through 100 PM EDT... At 1226 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Sulpher Springs, or 13 miles south of Trenton, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, up to penny sized hail, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Menlo, Rising Fawn and Cloudland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
